channel.title: Updates: Elevated Blood Lead Levels In Public Housing [Records Request]
channel.description: Updates on the Data Liberation Project's Elevated Blood Lead Levels In Public Housing request

item.title: Tracking Number Changed (Again-Again-Again)
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On March 31, 2023, HUD emailed a notice that they have changed the tracking number for this request from 23-FI-RO2-00859 to 23-FI-HQ-00983.

item.title: Tracking Number Changed (Again-Again)
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On March 14, 2023, HUD emailed a notice that they have changed the tracking number for this request from 23-FI-HQ-00846 to 23-FI-RO2-00859.

item.title: Tracking Number Changed (Again)
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On March 13, 2023, HUD emailed a notice that they have changed the tracking number for this request from 23-FI-RO2-00688 to 23-FI-HQ-00846.

item.title: Tracking Number Changed
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On February 13, 2023, HUD emailed a notice that they have changed the tracking number for this request from 23-FI-HQ-00593 to 23-FI-RO2-00688.

item.title: Request Acknowledged, Placed on "Complex" Track
item.author: The Data Liberation Project
item.description: On January 26, 2023, HUD emailed a letter ðŸ“„ acknowledging this request and placing it on the agency’s “complex” processing track.
